title: Hotel brands book into small towns with big potential
description: Be it Khajjiar in Himachal Pradesh, Kevadia and Vithalapur in Gujarat, or Hoshiarpur in Punjab - many lesser-known locations in India are beginning to get branded star category accommodation options as hoteliers double down on expansion in the country.
